mapper.select: SELECT mc.id, mc.moment_id, mc.user_id, mc.content, mc.parent_id, mc.like_count, mc.create_time, mc.update_time, mc.deleted, u.nickname, u.avatar FROM moment_comment mc LEFT JOIN user u ON mc.user_id = u.id WHERE mc.moment_id = #{momentId} AND mc.deleted = 0 ORDER BY mc.create_time ASC
